description:
Previous (human) life of Lian Luo. She is the twin of Lian Shuang.
The major diffrence when both are human is color of dress, the Lian Luo wear blue dress and their sister whear pink dress, also can be distinguished by the hairstyle - Lian Shuang have two hairbun, where Lian Lue have only one, but Lian Shuang sometimes pretend her sister and change her hairstyle to one hairbun, but still wear pink dress.
name: Lian Luo
